sys:positions.title: Minister of Agricultural Development of Nepal

description: Hari Parajuli is a Nepali politician and a member of the Communist Party of Nepal (Unified Socialist). He was the Minister of Agricultural Development of Nepal from 25 February 2014 to 2 July 2015 under the Sushil Koirala-led government. Parajuli resigned from his post following controversy and media criticism over his alleged indecent behavior with women during a National paddy day event on 1 July 2015.
short_description: Nepali politician who served as the Minister of Agricultural Development of Nepal.
